author: rwaldhoff
msg: Hitting java.sun.com doesn't work for some reason, although many other "external" urls do.  To get the tests to pass,  I changed the test case to hit jakarta.apache.org instead, although we should figure out what's wrong with java.sun.com as noted in the source comments.
